mapper.select: SELECT comment.*, m1.nick_name as `writer_nick`, m1.profile_img as `writer_profile`, m2.nick_name as `tag_writer_nick`, m2.profile_img as `tag_writer_profile` FROM comment left join member m1 on comment.writer_id = m1.pid left join member m2 on comment.tag_writer_id = m2.pid WHERE review_id = #{reviewId};
